DOC.brief_summary: In study investigator evaluate effect low high frequency Deep Brain stimulation subthalamic nucleus ( STN ) Parkinson 's patient note change walking . The investigator ' hypothesis : 1 . Stimulation 60 Hertz ( Hz ) associate improved gait increase stride length faster time Stand walk sit test . 2 . There worsen Unified Parkinson 's Disease Rating Scale ( UPDRS ) 60 Hz .
DOC.brief_title: Deep Brain Stimulation ( DBS ) Frequency Effects Gait Parkinson 's Disease ( PD )
DOC.criteria: Be patient Vanderbilt Movement Disorders clinic . Report change gait . Be able walk independently PD medication 1216 hour . Have stable dose PD medication prior three month . Not cognitively impaired , give informed consent . MMSE > 24 . See inclusion criterion .
